desc: DUMMY
Cannot perform any actions and attacks cannot be evaded. Sleep state will be lifted when damaged.

Chance of ignoring orders. May aid enemies or do nothing.

Receive damage after performing an action.

Unable to participate in battle. Does not heal after battle and can only be cured by healing at a leyline fount or by using recovery items or skills.
